content.detailedDescription: i lived in central missouri & my parents and younger siblings still living at home lived in southeast missouri. every month or so i'd go down for the weekend. its a touristy town with trail riders, rodeos, camping, canoeing, and swimming. if you like horses, woods,outdoors & no people to bother you, it's ideal. it was relaxing & a break from campus life in columbia. on a weekend there in summer of 1983 (approximate), my family & i was watching a movie on saturday night. there were six of us. during commercial break my brother went out onto front porch but never came back in. i went out to see what he was doing and he was looking at what we thought was a car with one headlight parked at the top of our driveway about 50 ft to the left of our house. we thought they were parked because we didn't hear the motor running. we decided the light was too big to be a headlight & we were looking through trees at the wooded area on the side of our yard too so it wasn't a clear shot view. we went back in to tell our dad there was a truck or something with 1 headlight "parked" on the hill of the driveway. he came to door & said it was probably doc, who had a cabin at the far end of the driveway, like a mile up into the woods. we asked why would he be parked there just sitting. my brother & i went back onto the porch & noticed it had moved farther down the driveway closer to the yard. we watched it and we couldn't see it move, like clock hands it gained ground & was getting closer but we just couldn't see it moving. it got to edge of road & moved off road & thru tree until it got about 20 ft away. now it was passed the trees & we had a clear view of it. it was about a 3 ft high & 3ft wide complete circle of white light. an all light globe? circle? orb? but it didn't shine a beam, it was all light and all we could see of it was the front. it was bright enough that all we could see beyond the edges of it was the background darkness  of a small fence & the trees on the other side of driveway. it moved until it was 10 ft in front of us. it never did anything. it was so subtle. i guess if it shot up in the air and flew around the house, we would've been more scared, but it just didn't "seem" like it was moving or anything even though it was getting closer to our house. all the family came to the door & looked at it 2-3 times in the 45 min to an hour from the first time we saw it. we would go back in and then a few minutes later someone would go see how close it was. then when we went to look to see if it was still there & how close it was. thinking back on it, it terrifies me that it got that close. if it would have done something fantastic, it would have been so much more of an incident, but it was so subtle with the way it moved. i keep watching these "ufo" shows to see if anyone has ever seen anything like this & i would know they were truthful because i saw that same thing. another important point needs mentioning about that is where our house was located. it was out in the country so far, our nearest neighbor was 3 miles away. local people said that no one could live on that ridge. there was abandoned cabins up at the end of our driveway which was about 1 1/2 miles long. on the highway where our driveway started was an abandoned house & my family bought a cabin & house that had been abandoned and fixed them up & that's  where they lived. people had bought property to build on & even attempted to build on that ridge, but for unknown reasons, they were always abandoned. this is true & there were 5 other people who witnessed this. in fact, i'm a little afraid bringing this up for fear of something happening. i've wanted to say something about it but worried about being labeled one of those people who think they saw a ufo. we, my family have never brought this up with all of us together but if asked confidentially, they would talk about it.
content.summary: Orb all light but didnt shine. moved thru trees & yrd like clock hands we never saw it move but it did move 50 ft

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a rural area of north texas.  i had cleared some brush from my property and was burning the brush pile.  i had been watching aircraft fly over e to w (commercial craft out of dfw int'l).  i was standing just s of the burning brush pile and was facing sw. there was a light breeze from the s, carrying any embers to the n.  out of the corner of my eye, i saw a single flash of bright, white light - fairly high in the western sky.  i thought this was the anti-collision beacon on an aircraft, but there was only the single flash of white light..No red/green running lights.  i watched the area of sky for a few minutes and then saw the flash again, this time twice in quick succession (about 1 sec for both flashes) and still no other colored lights.  i kept watching but did not see any other flashes.  the view to that portion of sky is unimpeded and the flashes happened well above the treeline from where i was standing.
i'm well familiar with what aircraft look like as they fly over.  i also know what a satellite looks like as it passes over.  these flashes were unlike either of those.  they appeared to be at a much greater altitude than the commercial air traffic and the flashes did not move...All three of the flashes i saw were in the same spot.
content.summary: High-altitude flash

content.detailedDescription: I reviewed my pictures then notice something odd and never seen it before
content.summary: Was taking pictures on roof top and went to review my photos of sunset and noticed 2 pictures with something odd there then zoomed my pictures and seen it was something i've never seen

content.detailedDescription:
1. my son took picture at airport he is 6 years old.
2. i noticed the craft in his picture a week later.
3. it is a ufo.
4.No clue on movement
5. i was in shock, but our family has a history of ufo sightings.
6. it was taken by my son of 6 years old he was randomly just taking pictures pure luck.
content.summary: I have a picture! my son randomly took a picture at airport and i saw it when going through his pictures.

content.detailedDescription: When i went to bed saturday night i noticed there was a crescent moon out, while i was looking at it i noticed an orange colored dot just above the horizon and off to the right of the moon. i grabbed the binoculars i keep in my bedroom and looked at it. the object was dim at first and then it began to brighten to a brilliant orange color, then it would dim again, it even turned a reddish orange color, it did not change color quickly but rather slowly. at first the object was stationary but then i noticed it was moving in a northerly direction but very slowly, i would estimate about 50-70 mph. i live near an airport and have seen many aircraft flying above and arround my house, so i am familiar with how fast they move, this object was moving way too slow to be an airplane, even slower than a single engine propeller airplane. the object was approximately 15 to 20 miles away, arround the nampa or caldwell area. the shape of the object kept changing from an orb to a cone to a triangle with the corners rounded off. after about 15 to 20 minutes of watching it i lost it behind some trees. the weirdest thing was, i saw it again on sunday night at about the same time and it repeated the same pattern of flight, almost an exact repeat of the night before except this time the color changes were not as brilliant as the night before, nor were the shape changes as radical. like i said before i live about 2 miles from the airport, which also has a military airstrip next to it, so i know what all different kinds of aircraft look and sound like. in my opinion it wasn't,t any kind of aircraft i know of.
content.summary: While looking at a crescent moon i noticed an orange colored dot just above the horizon, i grabbed my binoculars and looked.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking out the trash. the sky was so clear that i stared at the sky to see many bright stars. immediately, i saw three lights in a triangle shape disposition moving north in a straight-line path too fast to be a plane or other known man-made object. lights were the color of stars but less shiny i barely could see them, but it was clear to me that was something. then disappeared in front of my eyes heading north. i was surprised and then excited to see it.
coordinates: 51.113915, -114.068377
lights where at w/nw heading north at 50-70 degrees from the horizon.
time: 2015/04/27 23:00 mt
content.summary: Flying straight-line path and then disappeared. three light in a triangle shape. flying too fast for a plane.

content.detailedDescription:
Local police have a report.  came home from work about 10 pm and sat on deck with a glass of wine (usual), glancing at a very bright light that came towards me after a while; the colors appeared as it got closer. got a neighbor to observe, he took out binoculars to look; husband came out onto deck with his own binoculars observed what appeared to be a ufo lights. i called 911 and 2 police officers arrived and also observed thru binoculars and i pulled out my cell phone which enhanced the image to film it.  the police call the military and airport to see if anything flying planes, balloons, etc were in the area and they said "no". the police reported the ufo to his chief and the military said they were going to investigate asap; within 20 minutes, the object started to leave. i went inside because i was scared, but my husband and neighbor remained outside observing until it faded away.  the entire event, for me, lasted about one hour, with others remaining to watch about another 1/2 hour.
the  ufo had beautiful bright colors in an oval shape with a dome on the top; seemed like it had individual windows with objects shooting out from it.  at one point it had a very bright red light, but other colors were blue, green, yellow, red.  i was excited and scared at the same time. my phone was the only phone that picked it up. i had a htc 1, an android.  i also filmed this event on my cell for 23 minutes which my brother in law will download.  i appeared on abc news and "good morning america" to talk about this event.
content.summary: Lights seen off my deck

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my alley driveway at home working out on bowlfex, it was a picture perfect day no clouds in the sky -  i laid down on the work out bench looking up at the sky i saw a large passenger jet fly over in a sw pattern.  a good distance above the entrails of the jet i noticed a solid diamond/circle shaped object hovering what appeared to be 1000 or so feet above the entrails of the jet, which to me was about 80 degrees from my location. the object then moved at a slow pace first in a northwest direction and then after 5 or so minutes changed direction to dead north. i thought it could be a satellite or space junk but when it changed direction it became clear that it was an oddity.
i felt excited and a bit mesmerized by the object.
i watched the object for those 5 minutes and then grabbed my camera and started snapping shots as it slowly moved out of sight by continuing its northernly path.
when i blew up the images, i noticed in a few of them that the object seemed to split apart or possibly there was a second object that had been shadowing and separated from the 1st.
content.summary: Clear day, saw craft hover and change direction

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were attempting to watch the lyrid meteor shower on the night of april 22 around 11:30 from our home in the direction of the area between stourport and kidderminster 2.5 miles distant. our home is on a hill (ele. 354). 
i saw and heard a helicopter moving into my field of view from the south moving due north towards what i thought was a very bright copper/gold star about 10 degrees above the horizon ne in our view. as the chopper approached the direct point where the light was, it suddenly turned red, veered north then shot up very fast..Almost too quickly to see..To a point in the sky directly above 52.21.56.91n and 2.14.36.38w where it them split into two separate lights, each reddish orange...One moving south for two seconds then stopping and appearing as a still star in the night and the second object continuing to cross the entire sky till it was nw of my home in the sky where it too then slowed and stopped. the objects just sat there and did not move after that but the helicopter continued to circle the area in a  counterclockwise search pattern for almost an hour till it then moved on to the north...I did not stay up to watch for it to return back south, the direction it first came from.
i called the local police the next day and asked about the incident and was told they could not tell me about it because of "data protection". my name and address were taken by the officer and i was told nothing more.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Helicopter approaches star-like object, object ascends quickly, splits into two, seperate directions.

content.detailedDescription:
i had just got off work at 8:00 pm central time and headed across town to get home. i hadn't eaten dinner yet so i stopped at sonic drive-thru to get a bite to eat and had just pulled around to get my order when i noticed a really bright light hanging relatively low in the sky. i would have passed it off as a plane or a helicopter, but it was exceptionally bright, so i kept my eye on it. i started noticing it to move in erratic patterns, so i knew it couldn't have been a normal aircraft. 
   i got my food from the window and pulled out of the drive-through and pulled over to the side of the road and watched it and noticed it was changing colors, changing trajectories, and exhibiting behaviors similar to other ufo sightings i had seen on the web, so i pulled out my phone and recorded it for about four and a half minutes. 
   during this time period, it started high in the sky, and was emitting a greenish-blue light, that turned to a solid blue. it would stop, then flash a really bright white light, hover momentarily, then disappear. it then appeared in a different location, this time emitting a vivid red light. it flashed a bright purple light, turned red again, then quickly moved across the sky. it then changed to a bright white-green light, and seemed like it was floating down similar to a feather falling, then started to rapidly descend. it hovered just above the treeline, then disappeared below my line of sight. 
   after the ufo disappeared and i stopped filming, another car pulled up to me and asked if i saw what they just saw, and i told them i had and told them i caught the event on video. i exchanged information with them so they could corroborate my story if needed. 
   it was an exciting event. i have believed for quite some time in extraterrestrial intelligence, and have seen ufo's prior to this occasion on at least three occasions, but this is the first evidence i have ever been able to collect on it. whether or not it is an e.T. object is one thing, but i do know it was not an aircraft i had ever seen before.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Spherical object; had varying paths of trajectory; emitted pulsating light: green, then flash white, blue, then flash white, red, then flash white.

content.detailedDescription: The arizona ufos i captured on tuesday, april 7th, 2015, followed a visit by our new secretary of defense the day before, who was in phoenix on monday, april 6th. on monday, when the secretary of defense was scheduled to give a speech at the university in tempe, followed by a meeting with local "military officials", there was only one cloud in the sky that day. that lone singular cloud was parked directly above the university area of tempe. i remember coming out on my lunch break and seeing what struck me as a suspicious looking cloud over on that side of town, much like the ones you'll see in the photos i've included here. as i've done before, with another cloud i suspected of concealing a ufo, i raised my cup of coffee in a gesture of salute and waved. it seems i received a return gesture when i came back out for my afternoon break. from that same area of sky, a white orb appeared from high in the southeast relative to my position. it appeared to be both traveling due northward, and descending at the same time. eventually it bounced, leveling off and then ascending in an easterly trajectory away from me. this eliminated any possibility that this was a balloon, and also suggested that my earlier greeting was being acknowledged. the last time i waved and toasted them, i ended up in a ufo "in your face" stare down. as for our new secretary of defense, given his background, i suspect he has at least a passing interest in ufos (or whatever it is they are called at norad). heck, he may even be a big fan of the phoenix lights.
content.summary: Day to day ufos

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was walking towards a coffee shop at around 6:00p.M. there was a lot of traffic and tension in the air.

2. i looked upwards and noticed a dark object hovering at a distance.

3. a triangular craft of some sort, it had protuberances. it hovered constantly and i felt it was watching me.

4. it was a stealthy black or grey which seemed to hover and move sideways with great speed. i knew then it wasn't a helicopter, drone, or other.

5. i decided to record the event in my phone. after watching the recording, i noticed a that a white orb had dashed through our line-of-sight while recording the first object. making my sighting even more conspicuous and bizarre.

6. i had to focus on getting to my destination. i turned the camera off and put it away.
content.summary: Rough camera while recording ufo. two ufos sighted: it seemed triangular at first but then it became toroidal/disc shaped. it hovered and drifted sideways. a white orb dashes through the camera making no sound.

content.detailedDescription: The ufo photos i took on october 19th are not at all spectacular, at least not in a visual sense. yet they are quite remarkable in another regard, in that i don't remember taking these photos. i also don't remember sorting through them, and deleting the dud photos from that day; the blurry ones and the black shots. so, as you can imagine, i was rather surprised to find these photos on my computer, with missing sequence numbers among the string of photos for that day. along with the included photo samples from oct 19th, i'm also including one from the day before; taken on saturday, oct 18th. this is a photo i refer to as "snake face." at the very least, it looks like a reptilian face in the clouds. the point is, i remember taking photos the day before, but not on the day after, oct 19th. as i look at the other photos taken on sunday, the 19th, it appears there is some sort of physics transaction going on. it looks to me like a "gather up and go" moment is taking place. oh well, have a look and decide for yourself what you think is going on.
content.summary: Thanks for the memories lost

content.detailedDescription: October 15th, 2014 turned out to be a good day for ufo hunting. i ended up bagging a handful of fairly remarkable photos on this day, each one of  which would have made for a nice individual trophy on any photo shoot. that sporty little ufo over the car wash sign looks pretty sleek, but it may only be a hood ornament on a larger ufo. looking at other photos of the same object, with various filtering, it's hard to be sure. looks like something else is hiding there in camouflage mode. the larger ufos are certainly interesting, especially that huge one parked in the clouds with a passenger jet passing by. hmm. makes me wonder about that missing malaysian airlines jet that disappeared shortly after takeoff, and after so many months has still not been found.
content.summary: Ufo photo jackpot

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were returning home from our high school football banquet. we were driving down a short road that at the time had no houses on it, only an abandoned barn. i was driving when my friend suddenly blurted out oh my god what the expletive is that. there was fear in his voice and i followed his gaze out the windshield and at our twelve o'clock there was a large triangle shaped object hovering very low, approximately roof top height and it was not moving. it was projecting a beam of light at us that we were staring directly into. it had a total of four lights, one one each corner forming the triangle and then one in the center. the lights were symmetrical in size and i cannot remember which was which, but the center light was either red or white and then the outer lights were all the same color, opposite of the center. it made no sound and was perfectly still. i was really caught off guard since i was driving and obviously looking at the road ahead of us and had not seen the craft approach which was hovering over the road. we stared at the object in shock for what seemed like hours, stunned in fear and then the reality of the encounter sunk in and i sped away. we looked back and the object was gone. we drove around trying to calm down and make sense of what we had just seen when we saw the object again a short time later in the vicinity but it was now moving very slowly and just above the tree tops. we drove around following it for a couple of hours before eventually losing it. we told some friends at school the next day who of course did not believe us. we took them out and over the course of the next few weeks between the four of us we had multiple sightings all in the same general area flying very low and very slow. we never saw it as well as the first time however. one of those friends who witnessed found a video on you tube of a sighting over lake city on the shores of lake erie, and it was the exact craft we had seen which made the hair on the back of my neck stand up and fill me with the same awe and terror i had felt that night and motivated me to file a report.
content.summary: Hovering triangle shaped object then observed in flight multiple times

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving back from the des moines area and had exited hwy 20 eastbound at the hwy 63 northbound exit.  when we pulled up to the ridgeway intersection, i noticed to the west a small star that was green.  it caught my eye because it was moving across our viewing area from left to right in a solid state.  i said, "look at that.  what is that?" i changed from a small green "star" to a larger orange sphere.  it moved southeast as we were driving towards the ansborough ave. intersection at a steady pace.  it was around 1am when this all happened.  i thought maybe i was seeing the headlights of a helicopter but then it didn't look like a helicopter because there were no blinking lights and the shape was wrong.  just a large yellow-orange round sphere-like object flying across the sky.  no tail, no body.  then, it turned around and passed a little closer as it went back toward the west.  my husband was paying attention to driving but did manage to see it. there seemed to be a green light - maybe the tiny star i first noticed - attached to it and it was blinking.  it didn't scare me.  strangely, i felt at peace, as if it was ok to see all this.  we are deeply devoted christians and i had been praying for clarity on things lately that seemed, well, odd around our home such as strange humming sounds.  as we pulled into our home, we heard a hum and saw a light hovering over us.  i looked up to see this tiny plane.  we pulled into our garage and got out to take a better look.  it circled over our home several times.  it looked like a small plane, almost like a toy remote kind.  it was very round, smooth, silver.  first we thought it was a real plane, but each time it hovered, it flew lower, almost skimming over our roof.  that' when we noticed it wasn't a real plane but a drone maybe?  there was only a green light on the right wing, none on the left, and a white light at the tail.  it had this lawnmower sound.  a tall thin man in a gold suv had pulled up to our residence but then backed out and was looking up at the object before driving away.  by now it was around 1:13am.  we went inside and when we heard it again, that's when i realized i recognized that sound before.  it was that odd hum we couldn't identify in the past.  we both thought the light, the plane and the stranger was all very odd.
content.summary: Small green star to larger orange sphere followed by drone over home

content.detailedDescription: Observed and orange orb flying fast from south to north then slow down and turn west then speed back up. the turn was slower than the straight line speed but still at an above normal speed. gauged speed by noticing regular passenger jets from midway and flying overhead in a east west or west east direction. the orb flew the distance of the visible horizon within seconds. i saw the object while i was throwing out trash at work. i work mid nights and saw it around 3:00am. i just looked up at sky and noticed it. pure chance. so i watched it until i couldn't see it anymore because of the distance which was about 15 seconds because it was cruising fast!
content.summary: Floating orb near midway airport

content.detailedDescription: Traveling south on highway 71, from clearmont, missouri, during november, 1967, and spotted a small group of white lights traveling parallel to our vehicle, to the south, at tree level.  the sky was dark with no moon light and the lights were arrayed in a semi-circle to my left, with a pulsating light between the four white klieg type of white lights.  the pulsating light slowly changed colors, but never turned white.  the klieg style lights were evenly spaced and in a semi-circle pattern to the left of the pulsating/colored light.  the pulsating light was at an equal distance to the klieg lights, with no other lights or craft detail to the right of this light.  we pulled over to the side of highway 71 just north of wilcox, missouri and observed the light array for approximately 2-3 minutes, outside of our vehicle.  the light array passed over highway 71, to the north of wilcox, and stopped moving.  a car passed directly under the light array as it hovered over highway 71.  i was close enough to hear a low, audible hum start to build and then the light array moved to the northwest at a very high rate of speed.  there was no other noise other than the audible hum and then quiet.  i have spoken with the couple in the car and they confirmed that the inside of their car was totally illuminated by the lights that they passed beneath.  we, the three of us, then re-started our trip to maryville, missouri.  i was in college at northwest missouri state, at the time, and had two different male students tell me of their observations of different odd lights in the sky that night.  one of the other witnesses told me that he had seen the lights while out on the west side of the college at maryville and the other witness told me that he had seen an orangish glowing orb hovering just above the ground on the south side of elmo, missouri.  elmo is in the direct path of the light array as it moved away from wilcox.  i never told either of these two witnesses of what i had seen that night until they had informed me of their observations from the same night.
content.summary: Observed dark, with lights, object moving and hovering, then moving away at exceedingly high rate.

content.detailedDescription: Appeared in north sky.  glowing red in the middle and yellow/orange outside.  pulsated three times and moved forward then disappeared.
content.summary: Glowing red in middle and orange and yellow outside

content.detailedDescription: Around 2am on june 10th, 2014, i encountered an entity/being which was standing outside my home. i was getting ready for bed and laid down. 5 minutes later, i felt as if i couldn't move; the same sensation i get when i have sleep paralysis. the thing is, i never had sleep paralysis going to sleep; i only get them waking up. instead of seeing things inside the room, i saw a faint light coming from the window(different from the moon's natural lighting/street lamps/etc). mind you, the blinds are closed, but i could make out a silhouette of a being standing right outside my bedroom window. it was facing to side(profile) from what i could tell. it had an enlarged head but stood like a human. it wasn't very tall and i knew it wasn't a person/human. it didn't feel supernatural either; it strongly felt extraterrestrial. i heard it make a few noises but it was very vague. during the entire encounter, the being was stationary and did not move or change direction. when i regained the ability to move, i got out of bed to see if it was still there. the entity was still standing there judging by the silhouette in the lighting. that's when i realized it was not an ordinary sleep paralysis. usually in sleep paralysis the visions, shadows, sounds and figures all disappear once you regain control of your body. that was not the case in this event. i didn't bother looking out of the blinds. a gut feeling or something told me not to look through the window. it didn't feel threatened nor did i. its presence was intimidating but not hostile in nature. that's the vibe i got from the encounter. about 10 mins from the initial sighting, it left. the being and the faint lights both vanished like a blind spot.
content.summary: Saw entity. standing facing to the side(profile). silhouette. enlarged head. i couldn't move upon encounter.

content.detailedDescription: I think they were in my room when i sleep. just before i wake up i see a huge flash in my lids eyes as if the sun was in my room when my eyes were close but many times great . by the time i open my eyes nothing there . it nuts .But i'm not lol.Please don't contact me .But  lots of  more stuff happen to me . when i was eight i see there ship clean as day floating about the mountain with my brother since th i see something peared  in my living room out of the air . no  mistaking it.What upset me most was it understood me that's not that it was there . i spoke to it in english . i speak a couple of languages. this is only to get it of me chase. that's all. were not being told the truth. its sad because as for me i couldn't understand or talk about expected to my brother.Thank you and good luck.
content.summary: It's here almost every night same time for the pass few weeks but thing been here for awhile i could see far away when i live not to far from here.Also i may have been abducted but not sure . this is why i black out in my living room that never happen bef

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a loud buzzing sound followed by chirps: a humming bird was flying in a large semilunar dips by me 3-4 times (seemed unusual, maybe i was close to a nest).  i saw it fly off, i started looking for it and then looked up seeing a large cigar/cylindrical object directly overhead.  i thought "wow, it's a blimp."  i noticed a twin engine propeller plane flying perpendicular to the object.  the object was moving fast went directly over the propeller plane on a southward course.  i ran into the house and got my wife and girls to witness the event.  it flew over a cloud, reappeared then faded into the distance.  less than five minutes later a commercial airliner appeared (wings clearly visible)--it was 1/2 the size and moving 1/3 to 1/5 the speed of the  cylindrical shaped object.
content.summary: Noticed directly overhead; twin propeller plan flying perpendicular

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were sitting out in the garage late at night and we saw a huge circular object hovering over the mountains. it didn't last long,and had no sound. however, you could see gold/ yellow light portals around the craft. it appeared for about 5 minutes and then just disappeared into the night. like it's lights had just turned completely off. the second sighting we had we saw the back of a triangular ship. three huge lights came on and i called my aunt down the road and she saw the whole side of the ufo with all the lights on the side light up. this second craft and few nights later was huge and triangular in shape. it went down through the hills with its lights off, then they came back on farther down the valley and then it just dissappeared. these ae not the only sightings that have occurred in the ohio valley. there have also been many crop circles,in the adams county area. these are the ones i have seen personally and at least 5 other members in the area. i have also found some interesting information through google earth on some military bases that may pertain to these ufo occurances. the photos below are at peach mountain in peebles,ohio and langley air force base,va. these design patterns on the terminals are none like a normal air craft. they have complete circular areas such as a ufo circular pattern.
content.summary: Large circular object hovering over mountains. baseball field in size. circular with amber and white port hole lights around the object. appeared 5 minutes then just went completely away,right before our eyes. no noise.

content.detailedDescription: My name is jennifer griffith (28yrs) old i took this photo using my cell phone on oct 4th, 2013 in seattle, wa around 7:15 pm please zoom in on the upper right side small light once i took the picture i zoomed in on the light on my phone and then i looked up at the sky but there was no light it was to small to see the detail not until i got home and shared this with my family using my laptop did i see more detail. please let me know what you think.
content.summary: My name is jennifer griffith (28yrs) old i took this photo using my cell phone on oct 4th, 2013 in seattle, wa around 7:15 pm please zoom in on the upper right side small light once i took the picture i zoomed in on the light on my phone and then i looked

content.detailedDescription: On the corner of disston str and battersby str phila pa. lunch time 12.07 safety team, helping young children crossing the str. 1965 @ clear sky to partly cloady , i see a dark object with smoke trail from sw to ne. left to right, makes a left turn and flys over my house at 2938 disston str phila pa. at@ 4 to 500 mph. im in 5th grade i know about metiors comets etc. i thought it was a ufo. or meteor. i felt it landed close about a mile away in the woods pennypack park. @ the hospital nazareth. and us 1. i coldnt believe what i saw was so close to me, and it didn't explode. i aske my best friend if he saw it my other friend said he did. i lost sight of the object as it flew lower in sky. my fellings were that i was inspired by this object to keep a watchful eye on my surroundings
content.summary: Standing on corner disston a battersby from right dark object . then on fire overhead 300ft. i say landed in pennypack park phila pa

content.detailedDescription: It's hard for me to talk about this. i'm an oil field worker, and also a truck driver. i haul crude oil for a living. my job takes me to remote places out in the middle of nowhere. i drive out to oil wells, test oil, take samples, and if the oil is good, i buy it, load it up from the well and put it in my tanker and drive it to an offload facility and sell it. i have a class a license. i've been hauling crude for over three years now in colorado, wyoming and nebraska. two summers ago i was out in a remote part of colorado, a place called the pawnee grasslands, right on the colorado and wyoming border. there is nothing out there, just open space, and a lot of oil wells. the closes towns were grover colorado, and maybe herford wyoming. it was close to sunset, i was out at an oil well called the "critter creek 03-04h", its an eog oil well. i had pulled up, went on top of the tanks, took some samples, they looked good, so i then hooked up to the tanks and started load up. about 5 to 10 mins later i was sitting in the cab of my truck, which was facing west, when i saw something coming over the horizon. at first i thought it was nothing, maybe a plane or something. as it started to get closer though i could tell it was not a plane. i could see then that the object was round in shape, but could not make out a color yet because it was coming at me from the west and the sun was shining behind it. i started to think, maybe its one of those big balloons filled with helium, the kind u might see floating at a car dealership. quickly i dismissed this, the wind was blowing hard at the time, pushing down from the north to south, which is very common for this area, yet this object was not affected by this cross wind at all. it stayed on a fairly low and flat course headed straight for me. i'm a grown man, but i began to get a little nervous and even a little freaked out by this thing, but at the same time i was excited as well. i started saying out loud to myself, what the heck is that, what the heck is that? by this time it was getting very close too me and my rig, i could see that it was blue in color, just as i could kinda make out the color, the pump on my truck shut off. my engine was still running on my rig, but my hydraulic lines that operate my pump for loading crude oil, called my pto, shut down. i had my window down and was still sitting in my rig at the time, i said out loud, what the heck?? i grabbed my cell phone and hopped out of my truck. the object was almost on top of me at this point. i quickly ran with my phone to the ladder to climb on top of the tanks, which are 20 feet tall, to get a better view. when i got to the top on the cat walk the object was coming over head. this was the closes i ever got to this object during this hole experience. i could see that this thing was perfectly round. i mean perfectly round! it was a bluish gray in color, if that makes any sense, kinda dull. it was very strange because the sun was setting, the sky was all orange from the sunset, yet this thing was not reflecting any of that color or light at all. not shining, nothing! it was almost like tho object was not flying through the air, but the air was going around it?? there were no lights, no windows, no lines on this thing, nothing. perfectly round sphere and smooth. there was no sound at all, in fact, i remember it kind of getting more silent as this thing passed over me. i remember thinking, pull out your phone and take a picture. but as soon as i said that to myself, all at once i thought, no, don't worry about it? this really bothers me when i think about it, that's not like me at all to not wanna take a picture? i mean, that's why i grabbed my phone. i can't explain why i didn't take a picture when it was coming over me? i know that i was freaking out a little, scared a little, but still, it makes no sense to me at all why i thought that? i stood there in awe as this object passed over me making no sound at all. i just kept thinking to myself, what the heck is that? it never slowed down or sped up, it never moved off of its course. i watched as this object moved over head and steadily move to the east and finally disappeared over the horizon. this is kinda the weird part that i haven't even told my wife, i was on top of the tanks watching this thing when it passed over me and disappeared over the horizon. the next thing i remember after it moving out of sight is standing next to my truck with the pump running. i looked at my gauge on my tanker and i was almost fully loaded up. i think maybe i was in shock or something and don't remember walking down the ladder from the top of the tanks to my truck. even stranger, when i finished loaded and put everything away and was getting ready to leave, i climbed in my truck and found my phone sitting on the drivers seat? i'm sure i had it in my pocket? i think this thing got me all worked up and i must have been in shock or something because i don't remember getting to my truck or getting into my truck prior to standing next to my pump? i've told only my wife about this object, and never about me being in shock. when i told her what i saw, she told me never to tell anyone else about this and to just forget about it. for the last couple of years that what i've tried to do, but its always in the back of my mind, what did i see that day at sunset? what the heck was that thing? the best i've ever been able to come up with is maybe it was some kind of military object. after a lot of thinking and exploring and reading, i have found out that there is a military air force base east of there and that this area where i was at and the object was heading is full of nuclear missile silo's. maybe its some kind of defense thing or something? i just don't know? i will say, it feels good to finally tell someone my story. it's been hard for me keeping this thing to myself.I thank you for this website, as i feel a lot better telling someone. if you have any idea what this thing was, or anyone else has seen anything in this area similar, please let me know. if you have any questions please feel free to contact me through my email and phone if u feel necessary. again in sorry that i can't pin point that very day, but i know the date provided is close. thanks again
content.summary: I saw a strange bluish gray sphere in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
1.) was watching tv around 3 or 4am because i could not fall asleep. 
2.) first i heard a loud, very strange, pulsating sound coming overhead from the east.
3.) at first i thought maybe sounded like a helicopter, but as it got closer and louder, it was nothing like i ever heard before. it sounded nothing like blades chopping threw the air, or a jet engine, it was something else.
4.) it was hovering very slowly and gracefully from the east to west over my apartment complex. i looked out the window and saw it had about five bright white lights in a triangular pointed directed west.  
5.) i felt beyond belief of what i witnessed. it was nothing like i ever heard or seen before. it was truely a ufo.
6.) it continued to hover slowely westward, and then it seemed to have rapidly took off out of sight. while making that pulsating sound.
content.summary: Heard loud pulsating sound over my building. i looked outside window and triangular shaped ufo with about 5 lights was hovering slowly to the west.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Leaving my mother's house after dinner, around 7:54 pm on august 8, 2014, while walking to my car parked on the street in miami beach, fl, i noticed 3 objects shining with the sunlight coming from the east ( beach). they were right in my sight, and the shining effect got my attention. i didn't know what they were, so i kept looking at them while i got my cell phone and started to record. the objects were coming from the east (atlantic ocean) with a constant nw direction; they were shaped like cylinders, like oil barrels or soda cans. with the sun in front they shone no lights or anything; it was just reflection off of the body of the objects. they had no wings or any other part. they made no noise, and they keep the flight formation until i lost sight of them in the distance. unfortunately i turned my phone sideways while recording and lost sight for a moment when they were right above me (or in the closer part of the sight). they kept flying in the nw direction. i never noticed speed changes, but one of the objects was getting a little behind the others, and they kept going straight until my phone couldn't capture them anymore in the distance.
content.summary: 3 cylinder shape objects dark copper color flying in formation to nw

content.detailedDescription: Seen a few prior to this sighting. my sis in law and i were driving from walmart the night before and a ufo flew over our heads with a burst of light.We was just driving and talking and then boith of us screamed at the same time. it was soooo unexpected. i saw green and my sis saw some red .The burst looked white. it literally flew straight and then wicked fast it shot a light and went to the left. i knew something was up . then my friend and i was outside on the 25th and caught this video. please take this sighting serious. i felt super scared for both sightings. please call me as soon as you recieve this.
content.summary: Very bright.No sound. scary

content.detailedDescription: While driving trough pv scenic road took this 3 pics seconds apart but object only appears on 2nd pic
content.summary: {dr}two stationary lights appeared and disappeared
